verses.text: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the Worlds.
The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
Master of the Day of Judgment.
You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help.
Guide us to the straight path.
The path of those whom You have favored; not of those who earn Your anger, nor of those who go astray.
verses.translation: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلاَ الضَّالِّينَ

verses.text: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah.
Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them,
And who believe in what has been revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what was revealed before you, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith].
verses.translation: الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلاَةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنْفِقُونَ

verses.text: Those are upon guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.
verses.translation: وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنْزِلَ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ وَبِالآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ

verses.text: Indeed, those who disbelieve - it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.
verses.translation: أُوْلَـئِكَ عَلَى هُدًى مِّنْ رَّبِّهِمْ وَأُوْلَـئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ
